segments.text: My eyes are drawn to the other side of the kitchen, where the children are.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see a young boy attempting to reach the cookie jar in the cabinet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He is standing on a small, two-step stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks incredibly unstable from this angle.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: One of its legs is splayed out, making it wobble precariously.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's reaching with one hand into the jar, which is clearly labeled "COOKIE JAR."
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: With his other hand, he's holding a plate, perhaps to catch his loot.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl next to him is reaching up too, her palm open in anticipation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They are clearly working together on this secret mission.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I fear that stool could tip over at any moment.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's amazing how focused they are on the cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This situation is ripe for an accident.
segments.speaker: PAR
